name: --linelength
desc: This is the allowed line length for the project.

name: --counting
desc: Set the model of outputing the total number of errors,total|toplevel|detailed

name: --headers
desc: The header extensions that cpplint will treat as .h in checks

name: --filter
desc: Specify a comma-separated list of category-filters to apply: only error messages whose category names pass the filters will be printed.
